description: So Cal's Hawaiian Shave Ice Truck specializing in Hawaiian Shave Ice. Currently serving OC & LA county with ice cold refreshing sweet dessert!Tropical Shave Ice is a mobile shave ice truck founded in 2009 serving Orange County and Los Angeles County. Tropical Shave Ice strives to bring you a true authentic taste for your palates to enjoy. Each cup of our shave ice is stacked high with fluffy, white, finely shaved ice topped with our mouth watering home made syrups and then covered in sweetened condescend milk (*optional). Or, get creative and try our popular fusion ice (shave ice and fresh fruits mixed with sweetened condense milk).Come and try for your self to see why we were voted best Shave Ice around. In addition to serving the streets, we also host private parties, fundraisers, and other local events.
name: Tropical Shave Ice
